Change the default location for projects Feedback Summarize this article for me Applies to: SQL Server Azure SQL Database Azure SQL Managed Instance Azure Synapse Analytics Analytics Platform System (PDW) The default location for files and projects is the SQL Server Management Studio Projects folder in your My Documents folder. Change the default location Change the default location by opening or saving a file or project from another location. SQL Server Management Studio stores the location of the previously opened project and uses it for the next opening or saving of a project.
